displayed_text: I can only try to change your view by offering problems that may be larger - I just can’t downplay the importance of your point. 1. The method we use to vote (referred to as “first past the post” I believe) will always lead to a two party system. If we change the method used for voting, we would have more choices; it would no longer be us vs. them. 2. It is human nature to stay away from perspectives we disagree with. Viewing the other side as the enemy is just a small part of this problem.
